'''Swirling Isles''' is a [[Realm Layout]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]] system.

The Realm Layout becomes available after completing the {{Quest|Lies Cast Shadows Under Gathered Lights}} and using the item {{Item|"Swirling Scene in a Bottle"}} purchased from [[Tubby]] in the [[Realm Depot]].

It comes with the [[Main Building/Mansion|Mansion]] [[Fontaine Villa: Illusory Annex]].

==Description==
{{Description|A wondrous deepwater archipelago, silent and serene, with a multitude of lights swirling about...|Realm Layout Preview}}

==Trivia==
* In this Realm Layout, it is always [[Time|night]] regardless of the displayed hour, as invited [[Companion]]s always greet the player with their nighttime-related lines and cannot greet the player with their daytime-related lines.
** Trying to adjust time returns the following message: "Cannot use this function while inside The Realm Within."
